abstract: Daughter of Uzbekistan's Pres Islam Karimov announces her father's hospitalization due to stroke, even as non-governmental news outlets announce his death; if reports of authoritarian ruler's death prove accurate, upcoming election to name replacement may destabilize nation's government.

headline.print_headline: With Uzbekistan’s Ruler Gravely Ill or Perhaps Dead, Questions Arise on Succession
headline.main: With Uzbekistan’s Ruler Gravely Ill, Questions Arise on Succession

snippet: President Islam Karimov wields sweeping powers, and if a transition is necessary, any discord over his successor may destabilize the Central Asian country....
lead_paragraph: President Islam Karimov wields sweeping powers, and if a transition is necessary, any discord over his successor may destabilize the Central Asian country.
